scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross in the center. He is shown with a halo, wounds from the crucifixion, and a loincloth. To the left of the cross, the Virgin Mary, dressed in blue, is shown with a halo, looking sorrowful, and is supported by another figure. To the right of the cross, a bearded man in blue and red robes gestures, possibly addressing the scene, with another figure behind him. In the background, a stylized cityscape with towers and red walls is visible under a blue sky dotted with stars. The ground is depicted as brown earth with some green foliage.
